root.name: Cake Mania
root.description: OverviewJill rushes to meet customers' demands.After the retail giant "Mega-Mart" runs her grandparent's bakery out of business, Jill decides to take matters into her own hands by reopening the shop and returning it to its former glory. Filled with 48 levels spread over four creatively themed bakeries, it's up to you to help this home-town hero stop big-business once and for all!System Requirements (PC Version)Windows: - Windows 2000/XP/Vista- 400MHz or faster Processor (800MHz for Vista)- 128MB RAM (512MB for Vista)- 16MB Video Card with 3D Hardware Acceleration- DirectX 9.0-compatible Video Card for Vista Machines- DirectX 7.0 or better (9.0 for Vista) Mac: - Mac OS X 10.3.9- Universal (PowerPC/Intel)

similar_games.game: Diner Dash: Flo on the Go
